New Records: Glenn Maxwell broke the record for the fastest ever World Cup hundred by nine balls.
Key Match Events: Glenn Maxwell scored 106 off 44 balls with 9 fours and 8 sixes.
David Warner scored his sixth hundred in the World Cup.
Australia posted a massive total of 399.
Adam Zampa registered a third consecutive four-wicket haul.
Australia won the match by a record margin of 309 runs.
